FC_DESCRIPTION: Changes the font color of a card by applying a "Glow" to it
NOT_CARD_OWNER: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not yours
CANNOT_FIND_CARD: {{author}} You do not have any cards in your collection yet
3D_ERROR: {{author}} You cannot change the font color of 3D cards
CANNOT_FIND_GLOW: {{author}} That `Glow` code is either invalid or you don't own it
FONTCOLOR_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL: The card's font color was successfully changed
